prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Guitar, Synth Pad, Strings, Piano, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
No Drums are present in this song, but it does feature Bass, Guitar, Synth Pad, Strings, and Piano.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Bass, Guitar, Synth Pad, Strings, and Piano, but without Drums.

Style 3:
This piece is made up of Bass, Guitar, Synth Pad, Strings, and Piano, omitting Drums.
